string.text:
Additional information on barter with factions :

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]Exchange reputation with grouping is available to all neutral groupings.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]For the exchange, it is necessary to approach the merchant of this group and invite him to exchange the group's contribution to the goods offered by the merchant himself.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]The more you contribute to the grouping - the more will be the level of equipment that you can exchange from the traders.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default]To access a new level of barter, you must make a total exchange for a certain amount.
